Job Title: Senior Brand Marketer, Shopify Supply

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About Shopify

Shopify is innovating faster than any other commerce stack. We put independence within reach for anyone with a dream to start a business. We transform enteprises and work with some of the world's biggest names and brands who are pushing the limits — and expect us to, too.

While millions of merchants in over 175 countries already use Shopify, the remaining opportunity is vat. This is life-defining work that directly impacts people’s lives as much as it transforms your own. This is putting the power of the few in the hands of the many, is a future with more voices rather than fewer, and is creating more choices instead of an elite option.

About The Role

As Shopify Supply’s Marketing Program Manager, you will be part of the Brand & Audience Expansion team to drive brand affinity and expand our fan base through product and platform development of Shopify Supply. You’ll have the opportunity to design and develop highly share-able physical products that resonate with Shopify fans and superfans, from merchants to developers; and the opportunity to create and execute integrated marketing campaigns to amplify our products.

This role does not have direct reports, but works alongside a team member and works closely with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities

Identifies and executes new product opportunities, from merch to limited edition collaborations, to reach new and returning Supply customersDevelops and executes marketing campaigns, from emails to Shop Campaigns, to drive Supply launches and ordersManages projects from pitch to final delivery across various workstreams, from product development (eg. sampling, production) to go-to-market planning (eg. site, seeding, social)Partners closely with cross-functional teams (eg. Creative, Social, Operations); and manages cross-functional stakeholdersManage and owns external vendor relationships, from merchant collaborators to manufacturers to fulfillment partnersContributes to and shapes the Shopify Supply program strategy and roadmap


Qualifications

Experience in D2C R&D and/or ecommerceExperience with the Shopify platform (bonus)Deep knowledge of sampling and product development/production processesStrong understanding of go-to-market strategiesSelf-driven with a high degree of ownership, business acumen, and creative risk-takingExcellent communication skills and cross-functional planning/project management skills Thrives in a fast-paced environment and have demonstrated capacity to balance speed and qualityAbility to influence cross-functional teams and champion new concepts and ideasFluent in fandoms and in tune with consumer trends/trend-setting


We know that looking for a new role can be both exciting and time-consuming, and we truly appreciate your effort. We're looking forward to learning more about you and your interest in joining the team.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
